title: ELO Hell
body:
I can’t handle this anymore Riot reallyneeds to go more granular with match making in solo queue.
It all started with several bad matchups in my placement games. I started Bronze 5 and ginally managed to get to bronze and since the 2/5 games have been with teams that should still be versing bots.

How can I fix this? I have limited time, so can’t commit to a team. How can I improve match making? Is it even possible?

Regards,

Loosing my sanity

replies.body: If you're really so much better than everyone in your elo then you should win more than you lose. 4 bad players on your team, 5 on the enemy. But i get the feeling you just might suck
Learn how to carry monkeys or deal with bronzies.

play Kha'zix. Even as a janna or malphite or heimerdinger onetrick. Play Kha'zix. He stomps bronze.

Alternatively, Darius works well in toplane. Azir works well in midlane. Rammus jungle works well if you need a tank and especially if the enemy team was dumb enough to pick full ad (bronze is the only elo where a 1v5 rammus pentakill becomes possible), Tristana works well in bot, and Zyra/Zilean works well in support.

You don't need to be good at these champions. You just need to be better than your opponents, and you'll be able to carry games. Most of the Intermediate Bots have a decent chance of winning lane against low bronze players, don't panic, stay calm and you'll float out of bronze in no time.

stuck in same situation :/ 6/10 placements with people going afk, admittedly another 2 games i got destroyed so bronze 4 for me, i work my way up a little but as soon as i start making progress, trolls, feeders and more afk's. 

its almost impossible to even improve when 50% of your games there are trolls, and the other 50% everyones flaming.
